content.text: Complete page 3 of Seymour's handwritten family history

text_sections.full_transcription:
Left margin note:
Mrs Dorothy
Davis

(3)

I born Seymour Epstein on December 14, 1916
on the East beautiful baby born
to Yuliana (also Rose). Rose was REALLY a
beautiful woman - I saw this myself
as I was Growing up. I Yulina was along
in High School now. This First World
book place in a New York Hospital
329 West 20TH St. My father was in
the real [?] Business - My father
was born in Russia. My mother was
born in Russia Too In Poland -
My father started his business in the
year of 1900. He was in business for
44 years before he passed away. All were
in wholesale. Also John I was young then.
Then we moved to LONG STREET where ALL 8
whose All 8 children [?] Summer [unclear]
[?] His or Her old story [?] - None - before
[unclear words crossed out]
[unclear] in Area California. I stayed
there only time then we delivered with
news about my mothers passing - His
MEDIA ALMOST My mothers passing -
Then my parents name is [?] Fields -
My Mother HAD 1 Step Sister
Her Name was May FACER -
My partner brother was large when Foster
She had more sisters & brothers -

HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_000026

insights: CRITICAL: Birth date given as December 14, 1916 (conflicts with Dec 4 on page 24)
Mother: Yuliana (also called Rose) - 'REALLY beautiful woman'
Born at New York Hospital, 329 West 20th Street
Grandfather from Russia, in business since 1900
Grandfather's business: wholesale trade for 44 years (1900-1944)
Moved to 'LONG STREET' with all 8 children
Reference to California - family member lived there
Mother's death mentioned - traveled for news
'Mrs Dorothy Davis' written in margin - unclear connection
Date discrepancy: Dec 4 vs Dec 14 birth date
Page numbered (3) continuing from previous pages
forensic_notes: CRITICAL DATE CONFLICT: Dec 14 here vs Dec 4 on page 24
Mother's names: Yuliana/Rose - Eastern European Jewish naming
329 West 20th St, NYC - verifiable birth location
8 children in family - large immigrant household
Writing quality deteriorating - age-related decline evident
investigative_leads: Verify Seymour birth: Dec 4 or Dec 14, 1916?
Research 329 West 20th St, NYC Hospital records
Identify Yuliana/Rose Epstein in immigration records
Identify Mrs Dorothy Davis margin note
